meta_description: MNA is a gateway to understanding the Colorado Plateau, engaging local, regional and global audiences with life-enriching knowledge and experiences.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

[Home](https://musnaz.org) / Plan Your Visit 

Open daily 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. | Thursdays until 7 p.m.

Last admission is an hour before closing.

### Closed

New Year’s Day

Thanksgiving Day

December 24 and 25

Phone: 928.774.5213

## Admission

General admission: **$18**

Seniors 65 and up: **$16**

Native Americans: **$13**

Youths 10-17: **$13**

Children 9 and under: **Free**

Museum members enjoy free admission. **[Learn more.](https://musnaz.org/join/)**

Special Offers and Free Admission Days:[**Learn more.**](https://musnaz.org/plan-your-visit/special-offers/)

#### [**Purchasing tickets online is recommended.**](http://1737.blackbaudhosting.com/1737/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=f359b8e1-38ac-42eb-82ab-e56ceb5ee283)

  * Tickets must be redeemed no later than 4 pm on the day of visit.
  * Online ticket purchases are final, with no discounts or refunds.
  * To reschedule ticket time, email info@musnaz.org or call 928-774-5213.
  * Tickets are also available onsite until one hour before closing.

### **Bring the kids!**

Visiting MNA is an easy and enriching family outing. To make it even better, [read our **Family Guide** with tips](https://musnaz.org/family-guide/) on bringing young kids to the Museum.**  
**

### Service dogs

MNA follows the U.S. Department of Justice’s **[ADA requirements](https://www.ada.gov/regs2010/service_animal_qa.html)** for **[service dogs](https://www.ada.gov/service_animals_2010.htm)**. The dog must be trained to provide assist...
admission_text:
#  Timed Online Admission

### 

Selected date

## 

## Saturday January 17

[ Other dates... ](javascript:void\(0\);)

Selected time

##  10:00 AM –  4:00 PM

Purchasing tickets in advance is highly recommended.

  * Online ticket purchases are final. There are no refunds for online tickets.
  * Tickets purchased must be redeemed no later than 4pm on the day of visit.
  * Tickets are also available onsite until 4pm, one hour before closing.

**Hours:**

Monday - Sunday 10am-5pm

**MNA Members** are required to reserve a visit time online, but do not need to pay anything additional for their ticket. Members are limited to 2 Adult Member tickets per membership and direct family under the age of 18 are free, but still require an online ticket. To become a member today and save on your admission fees please click **[here](https://1737.blackbaudhosting.com/1737/General-Membership "Membership ")**. All members must present their Membership ID or valid ID upon entry. 

**Discounted Tickets** such as Guest Passes, Museums for All, North American Reciprocal Program (NARM), and ActOne Culture Passes are not available for advanced ticket purchase. These tickets are available onsite at the Museum’s main entrance.

For more information about the Blue Star Museum program, please call the Front Desk at (928) 774-5213.

**Rescheduling of tickets and other questions** can be addressed by contacting our Visitor Experience Team at info@musnaz.org or at (928) 774-5213.

collections_text:
# Wagon Road to Mother Road

Journey through the transformative era of road travel

[Learn more](https://musnaz.org/on-view/wagon-road-to-mother-road/)

### Hours & Tickets

Open Daily 10 a.m. to 5 p.m., Thursdays to 7 p.m.

[Buy Tickets](http://1737.blackbaudhosting.com/1737/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=f359b8e1-38ac-42eb-82ab-e56ceb5ee283)

### Location

3101 N Fort Valley Rd Flagstaff AZ 86001

[Directions & Map](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/''/museum+of+northern+arizona/@35.2344812,-111.6999408,13z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m8!4m7!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x872d889fa3a4a37d:0xfd6b3e7e6cbf51aa!2m2!1d-111.665608!2d35.234486)
